name: Wired (itch) (desttinghim)
description:
Collect coins by solving puzzles with wires and circuits. How many can you get? (NOTE: There isn't a lot of content yet, but there's enough for me to be satisfied releasing it) 

Controls:

Left/Right - Move character

Up/Down - Interact above/below

Z - Interact (grab wires, flip switches)

X - Jump
